resources.string: Slide up to increase and down to decrease.
Failed to save the result. Please retry or give up saving.
Failed to save the gpx file. Please retry or give up saving.
Failed to save the GPX file but database data is saved. Please retry or give up saving.
Failed to save the database data but GPX file is saved. Please retry or give up saving.
Sorry\, failed to start work out because error occurred.
Sorry\, failed to the recovery preview work out result because error occurred.
distance of the lap that input by you(higher priority)
time of the lap that input by you(higher priority)
speed of the lap that input by you(higher priority)
path of the gpx file of the lap
path of the gpx file of the lap input by you(higher priority)
Sorry\, you can\'t edit data because error occurred.
data is not updated.(maybe nothing changed.)

string.name: description_activity_type
string.translation_description:
Activity type description.
%1$s activity type. E.g., 'hiking'.

string.translation_description: The text on a button to say cancel.

string.name: track_edit_activity_type_hint
